item.title: Updates Digest for October 3, 2025
item.dc:creator: FitGirl
item.description:
Updates for the following games have been added today/yesterday. All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages. All Update Digests, sorted by date âž§âž§âž§

The post Updates Digest for October 3, 2025 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
item.content:encoded:
Updates for the following games have been added today/yesterday.

All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages.

Alien: Rogue Incursion Evolved Edition
Repack page

  1. Alien_Rogue_Incursion_Evolved_Edition_Update_01.10.2025-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
  2. new! Alien_Rogue_Incursion_Evolved_Edition_Update_02.10.2025-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
Automobilista 2
Repack page
Automobilista.2.Nurburgring.2025.Update.v1.6.8.0.incl.DLC-RUNE (11 parts) (Source: scene)
or

Hollow Knight: Silksong

  3. new! Hollow_Knight_Silksong_Update_from_v1.0.28650_to_v1.0.28714-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)

SilklessCoop.v2.3.0-Kirigiri.rar (check readme.txt inside) (Source: Codeberg)

METAL EDEN

  1. Metal_Eden_Update_10.09.2025-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
  2. new! Metal_Eden_Update_20.10.2025-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
Out of Sight

The Sims 4

  2. The_Sims_4_Update_from_v1.116.240_to_v1.117.227-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)

Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War - Definitive Edition

item.content:encoded:
#3855 Updated The Troop Build 20250929 + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Tactics, World War II, Turn-based, Isometric, 3D
Companies: Giant Flame, PLA Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTi10
Original Size: 10 GB
Repack Size: 3.2 GB

Download Mirrors (Direct Links)

  • Filehoster: DataNodes (Speed & Usability) [Use IDM]

  • Filehoster: FuckingFast (REALLY Fucking Fast )
    Click to show direct links
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part1.rar
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part2.rar
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part3.rar
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part4.rar
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part5.rar
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part6.rar
    The_Troop_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part7.rar

  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Download Mirrors (Torrent)

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on The.Troop.Late.War-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-the.troop.late.war.iso (10,709,301,248 bytes)
  • Game version: Build 20250929; 2 DLCs (US Forces & Late War) DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10 to 3.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 10 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
On the morning of the 6th June 1944 the Western Allies began the largest seaborne invasion in the history of warfare. D-Day would mark the start of a vicious campaign to wrestle North West Europe from German control. The following months would see the ancient fields, farms and villages serve as a battleground for new, lethal weapons that would become legendary.

The Troop follows the campaign of British and Canadian forces as they face the German Heer and SS in Normandy. Take command of infantry, motorised and armoured units in desperate tactical turn-based combat against an AI opponent that is challenging and unpredictable, but fair and fallible.

Simple, complete control – The Troop embraces the best traditions of classic tabletop war gaming combined with the interactivity and excitement the digital format affords. You have complete control over your units’ actions; tanks will not expose their weak side armour with unexpected pathing, hidden guns will not reveal their positions by firing prematurely, infantry will not flee inexplicably when victory is a few heroic paces away. You are free to take your time… but any mistakes are yours and yours alone.

Game Features

  • Your AI opponent has no special knowledge and is subject to all the same rules and restrictions as you. The enemy has no fixed plan and will vary deployment and tactics with each replay.
  • Follow the narrative of the campaign from D-Day, playing as a range of different units (Commonwealth and German) in different situations as history plays out across Normandy.
  • Choose your scenario, choose your side, choose your force, set your enemy restrictions… Play. What will the enemy bring to the fight and what tactics will they use? You’ll have to wait and see, but it will not be the same as last time! Endless replayability.
  • Our first campaign is now live! Based on the exploits of the 8th Armoured Brigade as they battle the forces of the Panzer Lehr and SS, take command of a British battlegroup of persistent units that gain experience as the campaign progresses. More campaigns are on their way in the near future!
  • Choose your difficulty, play as you want – The Troop does not have one difficulty setting. Instead players can control a variety of features, rules and information settings to tailor their gameplay experience for the most enjoyable challenge.
  • A game, not a simulation – The Troop is born from a life long passion for WW2 history and turn-based games. Our aim is to give a little glimpse of that history through an enjoyable challenge. The events depicted are set in the broad reality of the historical campaigns, the missions themselves however are fictional and geared towards an enjoyable challenge rather than a strict depiction of history. We hope only to do justice to the spirit of those countless memoirs and after action reports that survive and continue to fascinate us.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous TT repacks.

The post The Troop – Build 20250929 + 2 DLCs appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Download Mirrors (Torrent)

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Rose.Of.Wind-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-rose.of.wind.iso (5,662,580,736 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of menu/intro videos in original quality with insane butrate. By default only recoded versions of those files are included
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 5.3 to 2.5/3.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 5.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Welcome to Rose Of Wind – a medieval tavern management simulator where you are tasked with reviving a legendary establishment and restoring its former glory! After your grandfather’s passing, the tavern remained abandoned for a long time, and now it’s time to fill it with life, warmth, and atmosphere once again.

Explore the medieval world, manage every aspect of the tavern, and create a place that attracts both locals and travelers from around the world. Can you restore your tavern’s former glory and become a legend among adventurers, merchants, and travelers?

Who knows what secrets the old tavern holds? Can you uncover them all? Explore the stylized medieval world, manage every aspect of the establishment, and create a place where both locals and wandering souls will gather. Restore Rose Of Wind to its legendary glory and become part of a new story!

Game Features

  • Serve Visitors – Each visitor brings a new story. Treat them to delicious food, offer a warm bed, engage in conversation, or simply provide a cozy corner for rest.
  • Prepare Dishes – Develop your kitchen, discover new recipes for dishes and drinks, and enhance them with unique ingredients. Create exquisite meals that will become the hallmark of your tavern.
  • Brew Beverages – Brew alcoholic drinks, create unique cocktails and elixirs that will delight your guests. A new recipe means new opportunities to attract customers.
  • Resource Delivery – In the tavern’s basement lies a peculiar place – a riverside dock where you receive supplies. Through it, you order everything you need: ingredients, wax for lighting the halls, coal for stoves and the distillery, as well as tools to repair furniture that guests might damage – accidentally or intentionally.
  • Hotel – Develop the inn within the tavern. Add new rooms, upgrade them, and monitor their condition. A cozy lodging becomes another source of income and unique events.
  • Decor – Create a unique atmosphere in the tavern by changing its exterior and interior. Make your tavern truly memorable – a cozy home for all.
  • Airship – An airship regularly flies over the city, announcing events from the outside world: holidays, weather changes, and other news that can influence visitor behavior and mood. Listen carefully – these signals will help you prepare in advance!

The post Rose of Wind appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Repack Features

  • Based on Easy.Red.2.v1.6.0-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-easy.red.2.v1.6.0.iso (16,806,709,248 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.6.0; 4 DLCs (Stalingrad, Normandy, Ardennes 1940 & 1944 and Shanghai – Nanking) are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 15.7 to 5 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-6 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 15.7 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
Game Description
Easy Red 2 is the game for those who know just what they want from a World War 2 shooter: simulation in weapons and mechanics, historical accuracy in battles, and expansive maps leaving room for large-scale infantry and vehicle combat alike.

In this new version of Easy Red, we wrote everything from scratch to reach a quality of game mechanics and optimization to manage and graphical design that looks appealing yet also runs well on lower-end machines.

In Easy Red 2, you will be taken to both the European and Pacific fronts of the war. On the European front, you will be taken to the shores of Anzio, Italy- working your way towards the bombed peaks of Monte Cassino. You will also be taken to Kos- the Greek island invaded by the Germans in 1943. In the Pacific, you will go to Kwajalein- the Japanese-occupied island invaded by the United States Marine Corps in 1944.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous ER2 repacks.

The post Easy Red 2: All Fronts – v1.6.0 + 4 DLCs appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Game Description
UNYIELDER unites Looter-Shooters, Movement FPS and Character Action Games in an infinitely expandable Roguelite to create Spectacular, Absurd and Chaotic Boss battles.

EREBUS, THE CAPITAL CITY OF ANTARCTICA, 1972 – A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, EREBUS finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA”, a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made “Heaven”.
CARVE YOUR PATH – Journey through the war-torn lands of EREBUS, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power.
A WALKING CATACLYSM OF YOUR OWN DESIGN – Wield RUPTURE, RHAPSODY and REVERIE, volatile sources of ineffable power. Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.
BUILD YOUR FINAL BOSS – Scavenge the data of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight.

Game Features

  • BREAK THE GAME: Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (and have fun)
  • EMBODY TENACITY: The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (but so do you)
  • DOMINATION: Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (or just pick the weird stuff, who’s going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss: With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss.

The post UNYIELDER – v1.0.1 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Ale.And.Tale.Tavern.v1.5.12-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-ale.and.tale.tavern.v1.5.12.iso (4,756,553,728 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.5.12; Bonus Soundtrack in MP3 format is included by default

Game Description
You are in for a stunning mix of genres: a coop first-person fantasy tavern simulator in an open world, action, fishing, hunting, exploration, fun and diverse quests. And, of course, COOKING! Play solo or with friends and feed the entire world!

The game unfolds in a cozy and beautiful fantasy world. Step into the role of the owner of an abandoned tavern. Work alone or together with your friends to restore the former glory and popularity of the Ale & Tale tavern. Explore new recipes, participate in hunting and fishing, breed animals, grow plants, complete quests involving unique and amusing characters. Decorate your tavern. Fight against dangers. Cook dishes and drinks that will delight your visitors, and they will repay you with ringing coin! And remember: owning your own tavern is fun!! And if you want something else – just explore the world, enjoy its beauty and your complete freedom!

Dive into an ocean of fun and complete freedom of action. Play the way you want and enjoy true pleasure! The Ale & Tale tavern awaits its heroes!

Game Features

  • Play solo or with other players. Coop mode for up to 4 people.
  • Owl Helpers â€“ Automate Your Tavern!
  • Enjoy superior graphics and a dynamic game world.
  • Explore a small, handcrafted open world full of adventures and activities.
  • Complete a variety of diverse story quests and meet unique characters inhabiting the game world.
  • Engage in whatever your heart desires. Tavern management, cooking, decorating your tavern and crafting, delivering orders, growing plants, breeding animals, hunting, fishing, and much more.
  • Fight against a variety of enemies and monsters using different types of weapons.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous A&TT repack.

Repack Features

  • Game version: v1.0.93

Game Description
Explore the Mind Ocean to solve a twisted case.

You are a Mind Diver.

Using experimental technology, you explore Lina’s Mind Ocean, fixing her memories to solve an unprecedented missing persons case. Lina’s subconscious hides many secrets, critical to unraveling the dark case.

Game Features

  • Restore broken memories and uncover the past – Every memory you investigate is missing a key detail. Anything could be the solution. Fill out the correct detail to reveal more of the past.
  • Challenging and satisfying deduction – Every solution is logical, but not obvious. You’ll need the right clues to deduce the truth. Listen to private conversations. Inspect small details. Slow down and engage your mind to make the right connections.
  • A heartbreaking love story – A couple deeply in love have both broken down. Lina is losing her memories and Sebastian has gone missing. A disturbing party seems to cover up something else. And a dark tragedy is buried deep in Lina’s mind.
  • Beautifully executed; Fully voice acted; Unique 3D-scan style; Award-winning story and puzzle design; About 6 hours of tightly paced gameplay.

The post Mind Diver – v1.0.93 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

  • HDD space after installation: 15.2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
A city built on sacred ground should never have existed. Now, the spirits demand retribution. There are certain places that humans should avoid; these locations become powerful magnets for human misery and tragedy. As a paranormal investigator, my job is to document these areas and show the world that the boogeymen are real.

Hi, welcome to my world. My name is Terrance, and along with my best friends, Tracy and Vivian, we document the paranormal. Join us on our nightly investigations. As an investigator, your task is to uncover the truth behind the hauntings in a newly developed town. Each case uncovers clues about the forgotten legends of the past and the dark mysteries that envelop this town.

You will encounter things you wish you had never seen, and they will haunt you for life. You will have to confront and defeat the boogeymen of your nightmares. In a terrifying confrontation with a malevolent force, you will narrowly escape death – only to awaken with unusual new powers.

Now, you must not only survive the hauntings but also master your newfound abilities to close the portals that are unleashing horrors into the town. Each investigation will test your wits, courage, and willpower as the boundary between worlds continues to shrink.

“The land remembers. The spirits rise. The astral realm has chosen you.”

Game Features

  • Explore a Haunted City: Wander through eerie haunted locations, an abandoned hospital, and dark forests to uncover what awakened the spirits.
  • Cleanse Cursed Locations: Methodically drive out the darkness using rituals, tools, and your growing connection to the astral plane.
  • Survive the Unspeakable: Face a nightmarish event that forces you to confront horror head-on in a desperate escape.
  • Harness Astral Powers: After your awakening, manipulate energy, glimpse into the spirit world, and seal the portals threatening to consume the town.
  • Unravel the Truth: Discover the city’s buried past and learn why its foundations are steeped in restless torment.

The post CORPOREAL appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
